channel.title: How to get any @Domain.com/net/org/gov/etc
channel.description:
1)CLICK HERE [url=http://get.live.com/getlive/overview]http://get.live.com/getlive/overview[/url]...YOU SHOULD SEE THIS.
[IMG]http://i120.photobucket.com/albums/o186/santaselfboy2/1.jpg[/img]
2)CLICK THE SIGN UP BUTTON.
[IMG]http://i120.photobucket.com/albums/o186/santaselfboy2/2.jpg[/img]
3)YOU SHOULD SEE THIS.
[IMG]http://i120.photobucket.com/albums/o186/santaselfboy2/3.jpg[/img]
4)THEN PASTE THE CODE BELOW IN TO THE ADDRESS BAR.
[code]javascript: var p = 'live.'; var ds = new Array('com', 'net', 'org', 'edu', 'gov', 'cool'); for (var i = 0; i < ds.length; i ++){document.getElementById('idomain').options[i] = new Option(p + ds[i], p + ds[i])} alert('domains added');[/code]
|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| javascript: var p = 'live.'; var ds = new Array('com', 'net', 'org', 'edu', 'gov', 'cool'); for (var i = 0; i < ds.length; i ++){document.getElementById('idomain').options[i] = new Option(p + ds[i], p + ds[i])} alert('domains added');
YOU CAN CHANGE THE WORDS IN RED TO WHAT YOU WANT |--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
[IMG]http://i120.photobucket.com/albums/o186/santaselfboy2/4.jpg[/img]
5)NOW CHECK THE BOX WHERE IT USED TO SAY "HOTMAIL.CO.UK".
[IMG]http://i120.photobucket.com/albums/o186/santaselfboy2/5.jpg[/img]
6)FILL IN THE REST OF THE FORM AND THEN YOUR EMAIL WILL BE WHAT YOU SPECIFIED.

item.title: How to get any @Domain.com/net/org/gov/etc
item.dc:creator: @stormcutter stormcutter
item.description:
@stormcutter wrote:

[quote=“davidude36, post:248, topic:32261”]Okay this is old now. Just:

  1. GO here https://accountservices.passport.net/ppnetworkhome.srf?vv=600&lc=2057

  2. Scroll down and click “Use an email account your already have”

  3. follow instructions and input any email address you like.

  4. ???

  5. profit![/quote]

Thanks that works!

Read full topic
